divs: sighting detailsi was watching sky as i have been since my first sighting two weeks ago. orange\red object appeared traveling south to north at meteor speed, i thought at first it was a meteor until it made a 45 degree turn. it traveled perhaps 5 mile then vanished. it's just my speculation but i think it went up and out into space. ive been seeing several object's nightly this is the first one i've saw making this kind of speed.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Dalton
There were no other sightings in Dalton on or around May 8th 2010
